name: Why did the chicken cross the road?
name_original: Why did the chicken cross the road?
description:
Hi! What you see here is a short (9 levels) game that I made while learning how to use Unreal Engine. It's not something outstanding, or even decent tbh, which is why it's free! But you can always tip a few cents. I can assure you that I'll spend them wisely.

Oh, and here is where you can buy textures that were used in the game: https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/simple-fa...

Have a good day!
